snippet: Ms. Whelan this week has been performing "Ethersketch I," a 3 ½ minute solo derived from Mr. Petronio's 2003 work "Underland."
abstract: Ms. Whelan this week has been performing "Ethersketch I," a 3 ½ minute solo derived from Mr. Petronio's 2003 work "Underland."

headline.main: Wendy Whelan Adds Performances With Petronio Company
